name: Hello Labo !
description:
PITCH

In Hello Labo you will meet two extremophiles, the frog Rana Sylvatica and the Tardigrade Paramacrobiotus. Observe them in their natural habitats and test their resistance. 

DETAILS

Developer: ArtFX Promo 2022

Release: December 2020

Platform: Mobile Android

Genre: Digital Pet

Languages: French
